data.actual_result: Brings you to the chat with the user then opens the channel menu for the channel you got the profile from
data.expected_result: Brings you to the chat with the user
data.short_description: Trying to send message to a user through their profile from the voice chat menu goes to the DM screen and then reopens the channel options
data.steps_to_repro: - Tap on a voice channel - Tap on a user in that channel - Tap profie - Tap "Send Message"
